title: Has Trump lost control of COVID 19? - Quora

response.answer_text: Trump never had control over the virus. He tells us that he knew how dangerous the virus was , that is why he shutdown flights from China at the end of January. Now he is touting the guy in charge of finding a vaccine , who has been working on it since Jan 13,yet Trump himself spent the six weeks after stopping the flights fown playing the virus. If he knew as much as he claims about the virus, and Truly cared about the American people he would have issued his social distancing and good hand hygiene guidelines right after shutting the flights down from China. That wouldn’t mean shutting down the economy like he try’s to convince everybody that it would. It would have been a just a warning to be careful…. This thing is dangerous. Truth be told , he never did shut the economic down , the govenors did. Trump was hoping that this would be like SARS and really not have an effect in the US , even though he was aware how dangerous this was. He Knew and damage to the economy would hurt his re-election chances ,so he bet American lives that this would go away. He lost that bet and Americans are paying off that bet with the lives of loved ones. He is willing to risk American lives to get what he personally wants… the Power associated with be President. He needs his base to get that! What happens if he is re-elected? He doesn’t need his base anymore! What kind of risks will he be willing to take for personal gain with the American people if he doesn’t need them. He is a greedy man that only cares about himself! I really hope we don’t have another four years of this man to find out!

Oh yes! Oh no! Can it be both? I'm not to sure about that. And you know, that's exactly what's excruciating. In relation most logical. But. Let's be clear. No one in their healthiest—simple of a mind, is thinking that a human being can, or does have control over a virus that's so deluding a pandemic. There are humans assign to such an attempt. The Anthony Fauci types. The people, with the pedagogy, only those stands a chance of controlling Covid-1 9. Actually these very same people with that apprenticeship background, is on the front line right now, engaged in trying to control/stop Covid-19. And here's the truth the actual inculation of that being a success or not, has absolutely nothing scientifically to do with President Trump. Said other,— in such pedagogical labs, its not about socio-eco, but instead socio-medico. So. In quest of your question, we can now move from the stigmas, and over on to the stimulants inciting your curiosity. Surely we can pin President Trump to a whole lot of things,— gone (“bezirk”) and out of control that is Covid-19 related. After all, the box stops with the President right? Wrong. As far as I see, I think the punch from Covid is that one, and only punch, President Trump hadn't seen, and he's on the carpet, bleeding like (“hell"), and hasn't realized yet what hit him. So. Are we as a people going to leave him on the carpet, and smack him a bit more? Or, help him/help us up? For every lost control Covid related to President Trump is America's “us” lost control. Period. There are by far more lessons ditched out to the American Nation than loses to the President. Well, according to the media, President Trumps seems more a custom to loses than the American,— this generation in particular. An attitude of mixed freedoms, privileges, common sense/senseless, rights? — So fickle an art of an amendment compared to the creation of the human species. Written words on paper? Or, a constitutional walk through the alleys down the valley of the grave? :) Means what? Can a graveyard economy be explained? And how? How do we explain to the children in addition to the complexity of a plague,—multi-inflammatory syndrome plaguing the children? How deed the children became part of this equation?, as I lost in tears. What sins have they committed? For the energies most agonizing in depravity since the pandemic is too tormenting in thousands of a list to be written here. We're currently still swimming in loses as a world, mind you. Something that's beyond the egoism of any mind. The coming together, as people,- (OMG) what a test. And, wether that functions or not, is at least still the better approach. And. yet the words of president Trumps echoes on. “We'll see what happens”

We have to look at this question with an open mind and not view it through the eyes of the Trump haters . No one human being could prevent or even slow down this pandemic to any effective degree. The research shows that this virus with not only its strength but even worse it’s ability to spread is something we have never witnessed before . According to scientific research this virus can duplicate itself billions of times . This virus started with one or two people being infected in Whunan China and spread to just about every country on the planet and all fifty US states . This virus took its toll on the elderly and especially nursing home residents but it spared no one overall . We in the USA live in the greatest country in the history of mankind but with that goes a risk that sets us up for problems when something like this happens . We have a lot of travel both internationally and in our country itself. We have a very complex integration and a high Chinese population in the US .You combine all these elements what could Donald Trump had done I hear a lot of criticism but no real plans or alternative solutions. One area that no one seems to be focusing on is the idiotic response by the airlines and airports to check people’s temperature when arriving in the US from China this achieved nothing and only allowed a ton of people into the US who were already infected but not showing a fever . We just celebrated Christmas and the New Year . New York City suffered horrible amounts of Corona cases maybe over 40 % of the total cases in the whole US we have no way of know exactly when this virus arrived in the USA . No Trump didn’t lose control there were tons of other factors as well .

Trump was never in control of it. His first move was to prohibit Chinese nationals from flying to the U.S. He did not stop the flights as has been said by others. He just stopped Chinese citizens from being on them. The flights were still full. The people coming to the U.S. that did not have symptoms were waived through customs without testing or quarantine. Trump lost control of this with his very first move. The U.S. had it’s first confirmed case of covid-19 on January 29. So did South Korea. Trump established a Task Force and put Pence in charge. Trump met with the Task Force one time in February. By the time this first meeting occurred, South Korea had developed a test and had distributed it nationwide such that anyone who wanted a test could get one. They have had a 5 per million death rate. The U.S. is currently at 269 per 1 million population. After the initial meeting with the Task Force in February, President Trump had two lunch meetings with Pence and one lunch meeting with Pompeo. He also had two intelligence briefings. That is the extent of things on the President’s schedule in February that could have had anything to do with the covid-19 emergency. Here is a link to his schedule if you would like to check it yourself. President Donald Trump - Public Schedule Calendar | Factbase President Trump spent the month, at his properties, holding rallies, meeting with supporters for fund raising and taking a trip to India. He did not take the situation seriously. He did not do anything.

Has anyone had control of the virus? The answer is no. It is a virus and a virus that affects a small percentage of the population. 90 to 95% of those who contract it have mild or no symptoms. Those with comorbidity or are elderly are the ones it affects the most. Trump has done as well or better than any world leader. Given the misinformation from China and the WHO he has done as well as anyone could. I wish people would get off the dumping on Trump when it comes to the virus. I think he has actually over reacted. I blame the Chinese. They only have 1 level 4 viral disease lab and it is in Wuhan. It has the reputation for not having the best security protocols. This virus was either created or at the least studied there and it got out either by negligence or heaven forbid, on purpose. Why do those on the left give China a pass. I think that needs to be investigated.

Thanks for the question, Dylan, but “losing control” implies that something was once under control. Testing (for what its worth) has increased by a factor of a bazillion. In my county, the local health department has had a sign out front for more than a month notifying people that free COVID-19 testing is available inside. Everyone knows that a multitude of companies are trying to develop a vaccine and those same companies are struggling to determine which medicines might be treat symptoms of COVID-19. Doctors all over the world are experimenting with a variety of treatments for this virus from China. No one has control of it and no one knows if a cure will ever be found. No one knows how dangerous it will ultimately be, whether it will be a simple fact of death like pneumonia or whether it will lead to another mass extermination of life. Everything has become politicized and it is not logical to assume that any nation’s leader has the power to control an unknown virus with no known cure.

Trump failed to take control in early Feb: he was pretending that it was not happening. And he does not have the discipline required to regain control. So: our economy is in a shambles87000 dead so far2 million coming$1.2T/yr in medical costsAnd if we had focused on containment in Feb we would be like South Korea with about 1/7 the impact from covid-19 that we have now.

Trump never had control of COVID-19, and he doesn’t seem particularly concerned about that. Instead he has used COVID-19 to play up one political theater show after another, including using this pandemic to go after his ‘enemies’ in the ways he can. Now he is prepared to take the economy hostage unless Congress passes payroll tax cuts that would tank our already depleted national infrastructure. Anyone that uses a pandemic in the way he is can’t rightly be called anything other than a dangerous narcissist.

Trump has never had control of COVID-19. Had he acted quickly in response to intelligence reports from China, he might have been able to contain the virus. But he did not take those reports seriously, and he still does not take the advice of Fauci and other experts seriously. Consequently, in a week or two, COVID-19 could be killing a larger fraction of the population in the US than anywhere else on the planet.

When did he ever have control of the virus? One cannot lose something if they never had it. That man has been a detriment to the entire country since the first time he ever spoke on COVID-19 publicly. Or have we forgotten that he suggested the use of a poisonous disinfecting household cleaner to as a vaccine (or whatever, - it is close enough). So, no, he hasn't lost control, because he never has had any, to begin with.

Good point! Hypothetically if we have this criminal for 4 more years, he will have further need for his base. Essentially he will no longer need anyone and he will then fuck over the entire nation. Criminality unleashed!
Has Trump lost control of COVID 19? No, not at all. It’s all going according to his plan. His guys created the virus and he’s using it to wipe out large segments of his opposition.
Did Bush “lose control” of Katrina? 9/11? Crises are called that because they cannot be controlled. If they could be controlled (like crabgrass) they would not be a crisis.
-He never HAD any “control” over it… He declared it was a “Hoax” once- remember ?! The man can’t control His own MOUTH. -How on EARTH can he “control” anything as Deadly as COVID-19..? :(

Trump acted on information he was receiving. At first he was told by fauci that the virus was not easily spreadable. When he did shut down flights from wuhan china he was blasted as a racist. Politics made to many decisions in this epidemic from the start. Trump haters and Nancy Pelosi made a joke out it
